page.title: 12GALA DAYS (CONTINUED)
page.content: The{Gala Parade}makes it way through the village eventually arriving at the sports field.The afternoon in taken up with children's sports the{highlights of which are the {marathons.}Handsome trophies,donated by local personalities,are presented to the winners. For the adults there are side stalls,band recital demonstrations of highland dancing,weightlifling,etc. The main competition for men is the 6 mile road race which is always Keenly contested. The Gala Day is a time which villagers look forward to.It is a time for meeting family and friends and a time for taking a pride in your community.
